from manim import *

class LagRatios(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        ratios = [0, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 2]  # demonstrated lag_ratios

        # Create dot groups
        group = VGroup(*[Dot() for _ in range(4)])
        group.arrange(RIGHT)
        self.add(group)

        # Demonstrate different lag_ratios
        self.play(group.animate.shift(DOWN))
        self.play(group.animate.shift(UP))

        # Show difference in start times
        self.play(group.animate.shift(DOWN), lag_ratio=0.5)
        self.play(group.animate.shift(UP), lag_ratio=0.5)

        # Negative lag_ratio
        self.play(group.animate.shift(DOWN), lag_ratio=-0.5)
        self.play(group.animate.shift(UP), lag_ratio=-0.5)
